section.name: Unit 2. Addressing the Language Needs of Adult English Learners
section.summary:
Welcome to Unit 2: Addressing the Language Needs of Adult English Learners. In this unit, participants explore what it means to really know a new language as well as guiding principles for addressing the communicative needs of adult ELs.

To get started, download these documents for use in Unit 2:

  • Pause and Think Handout
  • Communicative Competence Handout

View the video for this Unit and then complete the eight-question Knowledge Check.
